          <title>
            <string language="en">Measuring shape of magnetic fields</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messende Form von magnetischem fängt 
auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forme de mesure des champs magnétiques</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the setup for determining the shape of a magnet's magnetic field.</string>
